Detailed Description

Contains all interaction related to posts.

This post with BBCode translated to HTML.

create ( &$  post  ) 

Create a new post based on the data that was loaded into this class upon instantiation.

Parameters:
OsimoPost $post (reference) Reference to the OsimoPost object that is created after it is inserted into the database.
Returns:
